title: Universal Web Login (UWL) Guide
description: BlockID’s Universal Web Login (UWL) is a flexible authentication framework for all your websites and applications that ensures the highest level of assurance by reaching IAL3 and AAL3 levels per the NIST 800-63-3 guidelines. It augments or replaces the traditional username, password & MFA-based login with a passwordless experience by leveraging the user’s biometrics using BlockID mobile app. The biometric options include TouchID / FaceID, and LiveID (true biometrics).
